variants.Description in input context: The A30P mutation was studied for its effects on a-synuclein aggregation.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Quenched hydrogen/deuterium exchange (QHDX) coupled to NMR spectroscopy

Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using the aS protein with and without the A30P mutation.

Readout description.Conclusion: The mutation does not significantly alter the conformational structure of aS.
Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant structural change observed, but potential effects on aggregation kinetics.
Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutation was found to influence the dynamics and aggregation properties of alpha-synuclein without altering its overall conformation.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Two-dimensional proton-detected high-resolution magic angle spinning experiments

Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using the aS protein with and without the A30P mutation.

Readout description.Conclusion: The mutation does not significantly alter the conformational structure of aS.
Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant structural change observed, but potential effects on aggregation kinetics.
Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutation was found to influence the dynamics and aggregation properties of alpha-synuclein without altering its overall conformation.
